channel.title: Help with jar'ed client ~ Running from batch
channel.description:
Well i have jar'ed my client so you can run the files straight from the jar file but how do i run the Eyrescape.class file when the all the files are in client.java/bob I used to know but i forgot does anyone know?
ALSO
How will i be able to run like compile.bat inside the Jar'ed file is this possible?
